This workspace contains a sustainable aviation fuel (SAF) certificate broker application.

Project structure:
- Backend: Java Spring Boot (Gradle) in `backend/`
- Frontend: Angular (TypeScript) in `frontend/`
- Azure services for hosting, storage, and identity

Include Azure best practices when generating deployment and infrastructure code.
